verses.verse: It is <S%G4851><s%> doubtless <S%G1211><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> profitable <S%G4851><s%> for me <S%G3427><s%> to boast. <S%G2744><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> visions <S%G3701><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> revelations <S%G602><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> (whether <S%G1535><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the body, <S%G4983><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> outside <S%G1622><s%> of the body, <S%G4983><s%> I <S%G1492><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> know; <S%G1492><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%>),

On behalf of <S%G5228><s%> such a one <S%G5108><s%> I will boast, <S%G2744><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> on <S%G5228><s%> my <S%G1683><s%> own behalf I will <S%G2744><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> boast, <S%G2744><s%> except <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> weaknesses. <S%G769><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> By <S%G3361><s%> reason <S%G5236><s%> of the exceeding greatness <S%G5236><s%> of the revelations, <S%G602><s%> that I should not be exalted excessively, <S%G5229><s%> there was given <S%G1325><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> a thorn <S%G4647><s%> in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> a messenger <S%G32><s%> of Satan <S%G4566><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> torment <S%G2852><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> I should not <S%G3361><s%> be exalted excessively. <S%G5229><s%>

Concerning <S%G5228><s%> this thing, <S%G5127><s%> I begged <S%G3870><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> three <S%G5151><s%> times that <S%G2443><s%> it might depart <S%G868><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me. <S%G1700><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He has said <S%G2046><s%> to me, <S%G3427><s%> "My <S%G3450><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> is sufficient <S%G714><s%> for you, <S%G4671><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> is made perfect <S%G5048><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> weakness. <S%G769><s%>" Most gladly <S%G2236><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> I <S%G2744><s%> will rather <S%G3123><s%> glory <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> weaknesses, <S%G769><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> may rest <S%G1981><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> me. <S%G1691><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> there in which <S%G3739><s%> you were made inferior <S%G2274><s%> to <S%G5228><s%> the rest <S%G3062><s%> of the assemblies, <S%G1577><s%> unless <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> it is that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G3361><s%> myself <S%G846><s%> was <S%G2655><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a burden <S%G2655><s%> to you? <S%G5216><s%> Forgive <S%G5483><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> wrong. <S%G93><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> this is the third time <S%G5154><s%> I am <S%G2192><s%> ready <S%G2093><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I will <S%G2655><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be a burden <S%G2655><s%> to you; <S%G5216><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> I seek <S%G2212><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> your possessions, <S%G5216><s%> but <S%G235><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to save up <S%G2343><s%> for the parents, <S%G1118><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the parents <S%G1118><s%> for the children. <S%G5043><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will most gladly <S%G2236><s%> spend <S%G1159><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> be spent <S%G1550><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> <S%G5590><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> souls. <S%G1487><s%> If <S%G2532><s%> I love <S%G25><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> more abundantly, <S%G4056><s%> am I loved <S%G25><s%> the less? <S%G2276><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> be it <S%G1473><s%> so, <S%G2077><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> did <S%G2599><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> myself burden <S%G2599><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%> But, <S%G5225><s%> being crafty, <S%G3835><s%> I caught <S%G2983><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with deception. <S%G1388><s%>

Again, <S%G3825><s%> do you <S%G1380><s%> think that <S%G3754><s%> we are excusing ourselves <S%G626><s%> to you? <S%G5213><s%> In the sight <S%G2714><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> we speak <S%G2980><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> all things, <S%G3956><s%> beloved, <S%G27><s%> are for <S%G5228><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> edifying. <S%G3619><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I am afraid <S%G5399><s%> that <S%G3381><s%> by any means, <S%G2064><s%> when I come, I might <S%G2147><s%> find <S%G2147><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the way <S%G3634><s%> I want <S%G2309><s%> to, <S%G2504><s%> and that I <S%G2504><s%> might be found <S%G2147><s%> by you <S%G5213><s%> as <S%G3634><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> desire; <S%G2309><s%> that by any means there would be strife, <S%G2054><s%> jealousy, <S%G2205><s%> outbursts of anger, <S%G2372><s%> factions, <S%G2052><s%> slander, <S%G2636><s%> whisperings, <S%G5587><s%> proud <S%G5450><s%> thoughts, <S%G181><s%> riots;

that <S%G3361><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> when I come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3825><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> would humble <S%G5013><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> before <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I would mourn <S%G3996><s%> for many <S%G4183><s%> of those who have <S%G3340><s%> sinned before <S%G4258><s%> now, <S%G2532><s%> and not <S%G3361><s%> repented <S%G3340><s%> of <S%G1909><s%> the uncleanness <S%G167><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sexual immorality <S%G4202><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lustfulness <S%G766><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they committed. <S%G4238><s%>
